casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. EDWIN ADAMES (AC 21072)

Lavery, C. J., and Foti and O’Connell, Js.

Argued December 10, 2001 officially released January 15, 2002 Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by State v. Davis, 190 Conn. 327, 461 A.2d 947, cert. denied, 464 U.S. 938, 104 S. Ct. 350, 78 L. Ed. 2d 315 (1983).

The judgment is affirmed.
